inspirationalQuote.text: The good physician treats the disease; the great physician treats the patient who has the disease.
inspirationalQuote.author: William Osler

paretoBanner.title: Pareto Principle (80/20 Rule)
paretoBanner.description: Focus on the 20% of topics that will likely cover 80% of exam questions. Prioritize high-yield information.

questionOfTheDay.question: A 55-year-old male presents with chest pain that is relieved by rest. Which of the following is the most likely diagnosis?

subjects.name: Anatomy
subjects.description: The study of the structure of the human body. It is a foundational subject for all medical sciences.

subjects.name: Oncology
subjects.description: The study of cancer. This field covers diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of tumors.

subjects.name: Cardiology
subjects.description: The study of disorders of the heart and blood vessels. A core specialty in internal medicine.

subjects.name: Pharmacology
subjects.description: The study of drug action, where a drug can be broadly defined as any man-made, natural, or endogenous molecule.

textbooks.title: Goodman & Gilman's: The Pharmacological Basis of Therapeutics
textbooks.author: Laurence L. Brunton
